content.title: Exciting Updates: Giveaways, Kickbooster and Influencer Review!
content.creator:
Halliday
January 25, 2025
content.content:
$1,350,000+ Achieved!
Hey Halliday Insiders,
A huge thank you for your incredible support for Halliday Glasses! We've hit $1,350,000+ in funding with over 3000 backers!
Influencer Review
We've got a fantastic review from influencer Juan Bagnell, a true expert in smart glasses who has reviewed over 10 pairs of smart glasses! He shares his professional insights on Halliday's exclusive display technology and his thoughts on the future of face displays. Check out the full review now!
  Who Finally Wins a Free Pair of Halliday Glasses?!
Thank you for participating in our special giveaway event, backing our campaign, and leaving your valuable comments! Your enthusiasm, whether it was sharing your favorite features, creative uses for Halliday Glasses, or providing thoughtful feedback, has truly amazed us and offered us new insights.
  Now, let's get to the exciting part! Congratulations to our 3 lucky winners with the following Backer Numbers: 1361, 2056, 718! Once the campaign ends and orders are locked, we'll reach out to collect order details from the winners and refund your purchase after the campaign ends.
Here's the video recording the lottery process. You can click to check it out:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-vgVKKxZ5vR9eEXQGZcVbwXyqjcaWLuM/view?usp=drive_link
  Kickbooster: Refer to Earn at Least $47.90 Back
For those who didn't win, don't worry! Our Kickbooster campaign is on the way. Spread the word and earn 12% cashback from your every successful referral.
  Get rewarded with 12% cashback for every dollar you help raise for our campaign! For example, if you share your unique Booster link and someone purchases a pair of Halliday Glasses at the Super Early Bird Price of $399 via your link, you'll earn $47.90 cashback. The more people you refer to purchase, the higher your cashback rewards. You'll get the cashback after the Kickstarter campaign ends.
  How to Participateï¼Ÿ
1. Register as a Booster NOW:
https://halliday.kickbooster.me/boost/halliday-proactive-ai-glasses
2. Share your unique Booster link on your Facebook, Twitter, Blog, Website, or wherever you'd like!
3. If your link is used to pledge on Kickstarter, you get 12% of the pledged amount.
4. Refer to your Kickbooster dashboard and watch your commissions roll in!
  Join us in making Halliday Glasses launch a huge success! Sign up with Kickbooster today and start earning cashback!
